characteristics.name: Content Creation
characteristics.description: Consistently produces high-quality, well-structured content that showcases their expertise and creativity.

options.description: Clearly conveys complex ideas in a straightforward manner
Weaves together subtle insights to create a rich and layered narrative

characteristics.name: Engagement Style
characteristics.description: Fosters a sense of community and encourages interaction through their comments and posts.

options.description: Incentivizes discussion and debate with open-ended questions
Maintains a balance between facilitating conversation and setting boundaries

characteristics.name: Communication Clarity
characteristics.description: Expresses themselves in a clear, concise manner that is easy to understand.

options.description: Takes time to consider their words and choose the right tone

characteristics.name: Humor and Wit
characteristics.description: Incorporates humor and wit into their content to make it more relatable and engaging.

options.description: Uses lighthearted jokes and anecdotes to break the ice
Employed dry wit to add depth and complexity

characteristics.name: Passion and Enthusiasm
characteristics.description: Demonstrates a genuine passion and enthusiasm for their topics of expertise.

options.description: Spreads excitement and energy to those around them
Remains true to themselves and their values

characteristics.name: Self-Awareness
characteristics.description: Shows an understanding of their own strengths, weaknesses, and biases.

options.description: Takes time to consider their own perspectives and emotions
Acknowledges the limitations of their knowledge and expertise

characteristics.name: Empathy and Compassion
characteristics.description: Demonstrates empathy and compassion towards others, especially in difficult or sensitive topics.

options.description: Raises tough questions to challenge assumptions

characteristics.name: Adaptability
characteristics.description: Embraces change and is willing to adjust their approach as needed.

options.description: Bends with the winds of change
Rebounces from setbacks and keeps moving forward
